context: Is this true surround or virtual surround?
response: All surround sound headphones are virtual.  True surround sound can only come from a 5.1 or 7.1 speaker system.

context: Is this controller also a mic?
response: No is just a controller is been almost a year and still works great

context: Is this good for people with big heads?
response: Well I myself have a big head so yeah it is

context: Seeing as you can use this for PC now, how is the Xbox One controller vs the 360 controller?
response: A massive upgrade ergonomically. The buttons feel more mechanical and precise and the joysticks have a really nice texture to the top of them. The triggers are a little bigger and the battery pack no longer sticks out of the controller, everything is internal. Honestly a complete upgrade.

context: Do you have to have the DVD in the drive in order to play the games, or can you download everything on to the computer?
response: You do not need DVD in the drive to play the games once it is loaded onto your hard drive.

context: Can you use a gun to play the game?
response: Yes you can I haven't tried yet but it says its compatable

context: Does this game have multiplayer mode
response: No this game does not have a multiplayer mode, although I wish it would, like sonic adventure 2 battle

context: Does the joystick work with IL-2 Cliffs of Dover, War Thunder or Heroes and Generals?
response: Works well with War Thunder, that's why I got it.

context: Will this work on the Wii U?
response: Couldn't say.  I don't have one.  Probably will though since it works fine on my computer, as well as the PS3.

context: Which are the best native games available for the Shield?
response: Half life 2 and portal

context: Does this mouse have "free-scrolling" capabilities like some of the Logitech line?
response: No it doesn't , but it is a great mouse for gaming

context: does the audio from your television, redirected into this headset once plugged in and setup?
response: Not the way I have it set up.... I just turn the volume from my tv all the way down, otherwise you can hear both...

context: does anyone know another controller similar to this that is compatible with mac and usb ?
response: This controller does work on Mac through USB. I have a 2006 MacBook and this controller works great. The wireless receiver plugs into your USB port. The Mac recognized the controller automatically and that was that!

context: I have 6.5 inch hands, and I like to use a fingertip grip. Would this mouse suit me?
response: Sounds like you have roughly the same size hands as myself. I think you could comfortably use this mouse. It is slightly bigger than a standard mouse, and a decent bit bigger than most wireless mice. My favorite thing about this mouse is how comfortably it sits in hour hand after using for several hours.

context: Will this game work on a windows 7 laptop?
response: It does for me. I have it on my win7 Toshiba and my son is running it on a brand new win8 dell.

context: Can you enjoy this game by yourself, or do you have to be in connectivity mode and do multiplayer?
response: You can play it by yourself

context: anyone know what size LEDs are in this remote i kinda wanna play with mine and mod it up a bit
response: In mine it had 3mm Blue led likely 3.3-5v to find an exact voltage you would need to use a multi meter and check the voltage you could use 3mm or 5mm they have the same base wire size...

context: if I buy 2 of these, and entered both codes, do I get a 2 years subscription ? or do I have to store the other code until the first one expires?
response: They are stack-able...you can input them both to get a 2 yr subscription.

context: Can this be bought/installed/played on a UK Steam account, want to know before purchace?
response: I used a steam account to download, but I'm in the USA. Pretty sure it's ok for UK users.

context: Will it play correctly on an Alienware 64 bit operating system?
response: I don't know. Ask the developer. He is very approachable. I use it with a Win 7 machine and it is flawless. Highly recommended.

context: How high is the ps4 with stand attached (exact figure please)?
response: The stand adds about a half inch to the ps4's height. Approximately 11.25 inches. You should have been taught that measurement is never exact.

context: This was ordered for me and came with two cables. One works with the keyboard, but the other one? I need to recharge my mouse, what do I need?
response: One cable is for charging both the keyboard and mouse, the other should be and extension cable for the dongle.

context: Myself and one other person I know purchased this game when it was first released. Now when we load it in Wii it won't work, says it's not readable(both games, no damage to them) ??
response: I purchased this game along with another for my son and we have had no problems whatsoever with either one.

response: Yes, you can. But if you want performance, i suggest you buy the steelseries qck pad

context: is there a volume control key?
response: No; there is no key or slider specifically for volume control.

context: Do each of these games have single player options? I ask because IE 5 is required to play each of them?
response: It's been a long time since I played the game, But, I think there's a single option. " My opinion the game is too buggy, and the sound affects were awful (e.g. When something blows up )"

context: Does this include the 800/900 and the 600/700 or just the 800/900 ?
response: Hi Cameron, the 800/900 is the base package. The 600/700 is the add-on for the base package and is purchased separately. However, if you have FS2004 all 4 series are included!

context: why cant i play this game on kindle ? Is there someway that i could ?
response: this game is only compatible with  Windows 7 / Vista / XP.  Kindle uses a different operating system.
